Question: This person married actress Mimi Rogers on May 9, 1987; he was 24 and she was 31.
Hints: In 2005, this person worked again with Steven Spielberg in War of the Worlds, a loose adaptation of the H G.
As of 2012, this person is Hollywood's highest-paid actor.
This person asserted that there is no such thing as a chemical imbalance, and that psychiatry is a form of pseudoscience.
